name: Heron Data
headline: We automate document-heavy workflows in financial services and beyond
description: At Heron, we use the latest advances in AI and LLMs to automate document-heavy workflows. Our software handles emails, analyzes attachments, and takes actions like updating CRMs or requesting more info. We serve businesses from small companies to FDIC-insured banks in sectors like Small Business Finance and Commercial Insurance.

founders.name: Johannes Jaeckle, Founder
founders.description: Johannes is the CEO of Heron Data. Before starting Heron Data with two friends, he was an early team member and UK MD for Segovia Technology and most recently led the fast-growing remittance company Taptap Send. Johannes holds a BA in PPE and a Master’s degree in Development Economics, both from Oxford University.

founders.name: Dominic Kwok, Founder
founders.description: Dom is the CTO of Heron Data. Before Heron Data, he worked in data science at Revolut, Spotify, and Meta. Dom holds a BS in Physics from Yale, and is originally from Hong Kong

founders.name: Jamie Parker, Founder
founders.description: Jamie is the COO of Heron Data. Before starting Heron Data with two friends he worked at Knowledge Search firm, AlphaSights. Jamie started and scaled a new commercial function at AlphaSights to $xxm ARR and 20+ people globally in 18 months. Prior to this Jamie was an avid AirBnB host and used his rental income to fund a white tie hire company at the University of Oxford with Johannes (CEO of Heron Data) which they sold in 2016.

generated_description:
### Heron Data: Automating Document-Heavy Workflows in Financial Services

**Company Overview:**
Founded in 2020 and based in New York, Heron Data is a pioneering SaaS company specializing in automating document-heavy workflows across the financial services sector and beyond. Founded as part of Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch, this fintech firm has grown its team to 17 employees, guided by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell.

**Mission:**
Heron Data's mission is straightforward: to streamline and automate cumbersome document workflows that often bog down financial operations. Their AI-driven platform intelligently processes emails, analyzes attachments, and performs actions like updating CRMs or requesting additional information, effectively reducing the manual workload for businesses.

**Target Markets and Clients:**
The company serves a diverse range of clients, from small businesses to FDIC-insured banks, focusing on sectors such as Small Business Finance, Commercial Insurance, and Legal. By leveraging cutting-edge AI and large language models (LLMs), Heron Data has demonstrated its capability to manage over 50 types of documents, seamlessly integrating into existing workflows.

**Key Features and Solutions:**
1. **Document Automation:** Heron's technology automates data intake, extraction, and enrichment from various document types, allowing clients to process large volumes of submissions with ease.
2. **Real-Time Operations:**  By consolidating data from multiple sources—whether through email, bulk uploads, or APIs—Heron ensures that businesses can classify, parse, and sync data in real time.
3. **Cost and Efficiency:** Clients have reported significant decreases in processing times and operational costs, thanks to Heron's solutions that not only improve speed but also enhance accuracy in data handling.

**Impact and Growth:**
Currently, over 130 firms use Heron Data to enhance their operations. For instance, businesses have seen a 50% drop in time-to-offer for financing, enabling them to reallocate human resources to more critical tasks instead of data entry. This focus on operational efficiency has made Heron Data a trusted partner for many companies.

**Security and Compliance:**
Heron Data prioritizes security with compliance to standards such as SOC 2 and GDPR, ensuring that customer data is handled with the utmost care and responsibility.

**Get Involved:**
If you're part of a financial institution or a company struggling with document workflows, consider reaching out to Heron Data. They offer demos to illustrate the potential efficiency gains you could realize by automating your workflows.

For more information, visit their website: [Heron Data](https://www.herondata.io)

In summary, Heron Data is not just about tech; it's about transforming how businesses handle the paperwork that can often feel endless. Their intelligent tools ensure you can focus on scaling operations rather than drowning in documents. If you want to free up your resources and improve service delivery, Heron Data might just be the solution you need.
